metadata.description: Unified AEPR Standard + JRCALC Extended attributes for EPCR

outcome.description: Outcome from the attempted use of an airway adjunct

airwayStatus.description: The status of a patient's airway

selfMaintain.description: The patients ability to maintain their airway

obstruction_severity.description: Severity of foreign body airway obstruction

aaa_risk.description: Risk factors for abdominal aortic aneurysm

headache_red_flags.description: Red flag features for serious headache causes

massive_pe.description: Signs of massive PE (hypotension, cardiac arrest risk)

neurological_deficit.description: Neurological deficit suggesting spinal cord injury

organic_causes.description: Organic causes to exclude before psychiatric diagnosis

recovered_to_baseline.description: Patient fully recovered to normal baseline

respiratory_distress_signs.description: Signs of respiratory distress in children

thoracotomy_criteria.description: Witnessed penetrating trauma with very brief downtime

bloodGlucose.description: BM Reading: Blood sugar reading in mmol/L or mg/dL

fluidIO.description: To indicate whether this is fluid intake or expulsion

fluidType.description: To indicate the type of fluid

fluidVolume.description: To indicate the volume of fluid

value.description: The recorded body temperature in degrees Celsius or Fahrenheit

site.description: The body site where temperature was taken

respiratoryRate.description: An assessment of the Patient's respiratory rate

respiratoryDepth.description: The amplitude of each respiratory movement

cooled.description: Burn cooled with running water 10-20 minutes

entry_exit_wounds.description: Entry and exit wounds identified (electrical injury)

estimatedArrestTime.description: Estimated time of arrest prior to arrival

traumatic_arrest_causes.description: Reversible causes in traumatic cardiac arrest

values: Not Attempted - Obvious Signs of Death
resuscitationAttempted.description: Information about whether resuscitation was attempted

returnSpontaneousCirculation.description: Return of any spontaneous palpable pulse

CPRStart.description: The time of first CPR attempts

CPRStop.description: The time where CPR attempts ceased

role.description: Role of the first health care provider on scene

skillLevel.description: Highest skill level available to the patient

assessmentTime.description: Time that the care professional conducted the assessment

additionalInformation.description: Packets/containers of meds, Medic alert jewellery, Warning Stickers

pastMedicalHistory.description: The relevant past medical history of the patient

socialAndFamiliyHistory.description: The relevant family and social history of the patient

name.description: Name of the Drug or Medication

dosage.description: Dosage of the Drug or Medication

compliance.description: Extent to which patient has complied with regime

energy.description: Energy options for the defibrillation shock (Joules)

defibrillationAttempted.description: To indicate whether defibrillation was attempted

dispatchTime.description: The time at which the dispatch was notified

ambulanceArrivalTime.description: Time Emergency Ambulance arrives at destination

responseMobileTime.description: Moment when emergency response vehicle begins to move

destinationHealthcareProvider.description: The healthcare facility to which the patient was transported

CPROngoing.description: To indicate whether CPR was ongoing on Patient Handover

arrivalTime.description: Arrival time at the healthcare provider

arrivalDate.description: Arrival date at the healthcare provider

ROLE_documented.description: Recognition of Life Extinct decision documented with rationale

route.description: Drug administered intravenously or via endotracheal tube etc

dosage.description: Dosage of the drug given (mg, g, l/min, mcg, etc)

effect.description: A statement as to the effect or non effect

leadType.description: Number of leads the ECG device has

interpretationTime.description: Time at which interpretation was made

relationship.description: The carer's relationship to the Education Facility

orgName.description: The name of the Education Facility

orgAddress.description: The address of the Education Facility

speech.description: Test for slurring or difficulty with words

conclusion.description: The observed conclusion of the FAST test

assessed.description: Indicator to show whether a Falls assessment has been completed

GCSItem.description: Item assessed (Eyes, Motor, Verbal) score range 1-6

transportRequestIncidentNumber.description: A unique identifier for a TRANSPORT REQUEST INCIDENT

values: Called GP who saw patient before calling EMS
Called GP who called EMS before seeing patient
Called GP and told to make own way to hospital
Called GP who told patient to call EMS
transportRequestCallType.description: Category of initial call for help

timeLeftScene.description: The time of the crew leave the scene

activity.description: The type of activity that played a role in the patient's injury

locationType.description: Type of location where the injury occured

interventionBy.description: The healthcare professional that conducted the intervention

type.description: The patient allergy as reported by the patient

personRole.description: The role of the person who confirmed life extinct

personName.description: The name of the person who confirmed life extinct

reasonNotSigned.description: The reason why the confirmation was not signed

open_fracture.description: Bone protruding or wound communicating with fracture

gentle_handling.description: Gentle handling for severe hypothermia (VF risk)

secondary_injury_prevention.description: Secondary brain injury prevention (maintain SpO2, BP)

injuryMechanism.description: The mechanism of injury experienced by the patient

immediate_care.description: Baby dried, stimulated, and kept warm

observationTime.description: The time that an observation was made

observer.description: The healthcare professional who undertook the observation

observationComments.description: Comments associated with a particular observation

observationType.description: The type of clinical observation made

delivery_supported.description: Delivery supported (control head, check for cord, deliver shoulders)

hemorrhage.description: Timing, volume, and ongoing status of obstetric bleeding

type.description: The means by which oxygen is administered

score.description: Pain score on a scale of 0-10

location.description: Location and radiation of the pain

patientIdentifier.description: Unique identifier separate from NHS Number

religiousAffiliation.description: Religious or Other Belief System Affiliation

Impressions.description: Descriptive of the condition the patient is being treated for

firstChoice.description: To indicate whether the first choice provider was available

reason.description: Reason why first choice was unavailable

type.description: The type of first choice provider that was unavailable

eye.description: Determines whether the left or right eye pupil is being assessed

signedBy.description: The name of the person who signed the refusal statement

signedByRole.description: The role of the person who signed

unableReason.description: The reason why the refusal statement could not be signed

value.description: Respiratory rate in breaths per minute

peakFlowReading.description: Measured by a Peak Flow Meter (ltrs/min)

outcome.description: The outcome from giving respiratory support

ROLE_criteria_met.description: Recognition of Life Extinct criteria met

responsive.description: Patient responsive to shout and shake

Counterpart to crash.description: Other vehicles involved in road traffic collision

Patient ejected from vehicle.description: Information on whether the patient was ejected

immediate_risk.description: Immediate risk to patient or others

colour.description: Observations about changes to normal skin colour

location.description: body location relating to the observation

status.description: Indicator as to whether the healthcare professional suspect the patient has received a spine injury

contentsObserved.description: Information about the contents from the airway

symptomType.description: The type of symptom that is experienced by the patient

substance.description: Substance name, amount, time of ingestion, route

reason.description: The reason why a patient is not given transport

signedBy.description: The name of the person who signed the statement

signedByRole.description: The role of the person who signed

unableReason.description: The reason why the statement could not be signed

administeredBy.description: The healthcare professional that administered the treatment

treatmentTime.description: The time of the specific treatment

_composite.description: Composite vital signs entry (BP, HR, RR, SpO2, Temp, GCS)
